column4: Anyone have a rough idea of how long an e2fsck -fyv may take on an 800GB partition? Hmm.
seriously, depending on how much stuff, and what kind of disk it is (RAID?)
it's not re-building the RAID5 is it?
oh.. you don't have a console on it?
6 hours seems a bit long, but ext3 fsck is dependant on how much stuff is on the FS
I do, I'd just need to call my buddy
I would verify that it's not trying to fsck and rebuild at the same time
Hm, before we did that... the RAID array was fine. It's hardware RAID, fwyi
this is why I use XFS on big filesystems :)
